title: Long Way Forward - Chapter 34
body:
I hope you still enjoy the story. Please, leave me feedback in the comments or in an anon ask! I love the ending this chapter

Word count: 1.4k

Series Masterpost

MAIN MASTERLIST

Rainbow baby

It’s been just a few days since you signed the contract and when you walked out of the X factor building where you picked some papers, you saw Louis parking his car.

“Hey!” You shouted.

“Hey, y/n! What brings you here?” He asked while giving a kiss on both of your cheeks.

“Well, uhm… paperwork… I can’t talk about it actually,” you admitted. “You?”

“I can’t talk about it,” he smiled.

“Wait, maybe we can’t talk about the same thing. Because… you know… I will be… a… “

“Judge,” you were at the same time.

“Oooohhh,” you covered your mouth with your hand and started freaking out in a good way.

“We’re both going to be judges,” Louis said with the brightest smile. “I can’t believe it.”

“It’s crazy!”

“Who’s the fourth by the way? Simon, you and I and…?”

“I heard rumors that it might be Robbie Williams but I’m not sure yet. You’re called into a meeting tomorrow, right?”

“Yes”

“We’ll find out tomorrow then. I gotta go now, I’m late”

“Yeah, go!” You gave him a kiss and you left after he paced into the building.

You got home but you didn’t want to tell Harry you met Louis, knowing that tomorrow it will be official and you can tell him without feeling guilty.

In a few weeks, everything was settled and Harry was as excited as you for this whole. You felt your relationship getting stronger day by day. You were happy that the loss didn’t tear you apart but brought you closer. The public was surprised that both you and Louis are gonna be judges in the X-Factor where Louis and your husband started. It was exciting for you too. Even though when you were in music school you tutored some other students, but you never had experience in mentoring other singers. And you haven’t been in any talent shows, you were lucky that someone from Columbia Records heard you playing and singing live in a club years ago. You followed the program and that was the only thing you experienced about the show.

On the other hand, you kept living a healthy life and worked out four times a week with Harry. You also went running twice a week which was always followed by paps, so you were on the news a lot. But people, in general, were happy about seeing you two together sharing activities.

You could be intimate with Harry again. It was a relief after a short time of getting along with your feelings.

A few days before the first day of auditions you had interviews and photo shoots too for the promo of the show. On the 18th of July, on the first audition day, Harry was there with you. You were nervous. You got there in the early morning. Before everything started you needed to stop.

“Are you okay, pet?” Harry asked.

“Yeah, I just need the toilet,” you said and he went with you.

“You don’t have to come in,” you told him.

“Fine, but I’ll stay close,” he said. After what you’ve gone through he didn’t want to leave you alone especially when you felt sick. You drank some water and washed your face with cold water. It made you feel a bit better.

They chose a dress for you and you got your makeup done. Until that Harry was with Louis catching up on things. When you walked into the room they were in, Harry’s eyes stopped at you and he dropped his jaws.

“Gosh! You look amazing!” he said and stood up to kiss you.

“Thank you!” you smiled. “But don’t ruin my lipstick, please.”

“y/n, you’re gorgeous,” Louis said.

“I heard that” you heard a familiar voice. You turned around to see Eleanor.

“Hey, girl!” you said and hugged her.

“Just kidding, you really are beautiful” she smiled at you.

“Let’s get going, fellow judges” Simon shouted into the room. The others stayed back and you went to sit in your chair that had your name on it. Luckily the nerves went away after a few performances and you started enjoying this whole thing. You had some breaks and Harry always went out to you to check if you’re alright. It always made the audience scream a bit. So in the third break that day you wanted to show them who’s Mrs. Styles. When Harry walked in, all the girls screamed in the audience. You didn’t stand up and turned your chair so people saw you from the profile. Harry leaned down to you.

“How’s my baby?” he asked.

“I’m good.” you smiled. “Harry”

“Mhmh” you didn’t say anything but kissed him. You heard the audience go crazy and you knew there was at least one video about your kiss.

“Stop the PDA, please” Louis whined next to you with Harry’s bum in his face.

“Sorry, Lou,” he said.

“15 seconds before starting again” you heard.

“Keep my girl safe here,” Harry told Louis.

“You too with my girl” he shouted after him.

There were nine days of auditions and it was a bit tiring, but an amazing experience, you couldn’t wait to find out which group you’re gonna get. The performers were great and you had some favorites. You thought you’d be happy with any group.

At the end of deliberation day, you found out your group. As they filmed Dermot walked with you.

“Which group you want?”

“I have favorites in all groups, but …the girls,” you said excitedly. Then there was a big door that was opened to you. And you found not others but the girls there. They screamed, you screamed and they all gathered around you in a big hug. You went and hugged everyone in there.

Quickly after that, the six-chair challenge was filmed in three days.  It was really hard to choose only six from those incredible girls, but Harry and the basically everyone else helped you through it. You’ve got some free time after that. The Judges’ House was set to be filmed in September so you had a month until you have to work again.

Two weeks later you and Harry were at home.

“Love,” you sat down next to him on the couch.

“Yes,” he looked at you.

“I’ve gotta tell you something.” He looked so worried.

“I missed my period and I think we should go to the doctor to see if everything’s alright down there.”

“Of course. You wanna go now?” he asked.

“No, it’s fine if we go tomorrow or some day this week.” you didn’t want to upset him.

“Okay, I call him now and I set an appointment for tomorrow,” he said and already dialed the number.

The next day you sat in the waiting room in the evening chatting quietly with Harry.

“Mrs. Styles” you heard after the door open. After he checked you, he put down his glasses and looked at both of you.

“Mrs. Styles, your ovaries and your uterus as a whole are fine. There’s no damage I can see. But I can see something” it seemed o you that he’s talking even slower than Harry. “I say something because I’m not completely sure and I don’t want to make you too excited. If I’m right, you’re pregnant again” you gasped and Harry tightened the grip around you. “But as I say I don’t want to make you too excited. We need to check about a week later to be sure. If I’m right you’re about 3 or 4 weeks pregnant.”

“Oh my God! I’d be happy if I was” you started crying and Harry pulled you into a hug.

That one week was so long and you could barely concentrate on anything else. But on that Friday afternoon, you went to see the doctor again. He did the same things as last time and he couldn’t hide his smile when he told you.

“Mrs. Styles, you are indeed pregnant. Congratulations!” you started crying just like Harry. When you calmed down a bit.

“You need to be careful now, no lifting, no heavy task, and instead of workout you should do only pregnancy safe exercises. I know you’re already conscious about these things…” he told some useful things and recommended clubs and websites. But he told something else before you left.

“Let me tell you something interesting. There is a term used for those babies who are born after a miscarriage. I, myself was born after my mother lost her baby.”

“What’s the term?” Harry asked.

“A rainbow baby.”

Here’s a cute Louis ^

At the end of deliberation day, you found out your group. As they filmed Dermot walked with you.

“Which group you want?”

“I have favorites in all groups, but …the girls,” you said excitedly. Then there was a big door that was opened to you. And you found not others but the girls there. They screamed, you screamed and they all gathered around you in a big hug. You went and hugged everyone in there.

Quickly after that, the six-chair challenge was filmed in three days.  It was really hard to choose only six from those incredible girls, but Harry and the basically everyone else helped you through it. You’ve got some free time after that. The Judges’ House was set to be filmed in September so you had a month until you have to work again.

Two weeks later you and Harry were at home.

“Love,” you sat down next to him on the couch.

“Yes,” he looked at you.

“I’ve gotta tell you something.” He looked so worried.

“I missed my period and I think we should go to the doctor to see if everything’s alright down there.”

“Of course. You wanna go now?” he asked.

“No, it’s fine if we go tomorrow or some day this week.” you didn’t want to upset him.

“Okay, I call him now and I set an appointment for tomorrow,” he said and already dialed the number.

The next day you sat in the waiting room in the evening chatting quietly with Harry.

“Mrs. Styles” you heard after the door open. After he checked you, he put down his glasses and looked at both of you.

“Mrs. Styles, your ovaries and your uterus as a whole are fine. There’s no damage I can see. But I can see something” it seemed o you that he’s talking even slower than Harry. “I say something because I’m not completely sure and I don’t want to make you too excited. If I’m right, you’re pregnant again” you gasped and Harry tightened the grip around you. “But as I say I don’t want to make you too excited. We need to check about a week later to be sure. If I’m right you’re about 3 or 4 weeks pregnant.”

“Oh my God! I’d be happy if I was” you started crying and Harry pulled you into a hug.

That one week was so long and you could barely concentrate on anything else. But on that Friday afternoon, you went to see the doctor again. He did the same things as last time and he couldn’t hide his smile when he told you.

“Mrs. Styles, you are indeed pregnant. Congratulations!” you started crying just like Harry. When you calmed down a bit.

“You need to be careful now, no lifting, no heavy task, and instead of workout you should do only pregnancy safe exercises. I know you’re already conscious about these things…” he told some useful things and recommended clubs and websites. But he told something else before you left.

“Let me tell you something interesting. There is a term used for those babies who are born after a miscarriage. I, myself was born after my mother lost her baby.”

“What’s the term?” Harry asked.

“A rainbow baby.”

Here’s a cute Louis ^

title: Surprise!
body:
Summary: You and Harry have been dating for years now and the two of you couldn’t be happier. The two of you are on Jame’s Late Late Show you’re stuck playing Fill your guts or spill your guts. How many secrets will you spill tonight?

 Harry Styles x Reader.

Warnings: Swearing. Mentions of gross food ?

 A/N: So because I’m Mexican I kinda incorporated that in to this one shot. 

 “Ok , so let’s take a look at the food that we have here.” You scrunch your nose at the sight of the food as James reads off each card. “We’ve got a salmon smoothie , cow tongue , hot sauce , pickled pig’s feet , cod sperm , calf’s brain,” You notice Harry make a disgusted face and you can’t help but laugh.

 “Oh you’re laughing now , just wait until you get a question you can’t answer.” He points at you , causing you to laugh harder. 

 “Not gonna happen. I am an open book.” You tell him.

 “We’ll just have to see about that.” James chimes in. “So this is how it’s gonna work. Y/N I’ll ask you a question , then you’ll ask Harry and Harry will ask me. We will rotate each round. Ok. Y/N will you like to go first?”

 “Oh , I would love to go first.” You smiled mischievously. “And I will give my love , “ you say slowly as you turn the table , “hmm. I’ll go easy on you and give you the hot sauce.”

 “Wow , you’re so sweet.” Harry sneered playfully.

 “First question,” you pull out the card and read it quietly to yourself first , “Oh. You better down that hot sauce now , I’m telling you.” 

 James burst out laughing , “what is it? what’s the question?”

 “Harry , what is the most annoying thing about me.” You slap the card down on the table and playfully glare at him. 

 “Don’t answer it , Harry. You can’t.” James laughs.

 “Listen to him. Or you’ll be stuck in the dog house for- NO!” You didn’t even finish your empty threat before he threw the shot glass of hot sauce back. “Oh my God.” You cover your mouth in shock. 

 “It’s spicy.” he cries. “Where’s the water?” He looks around his area for his glass of water.

 “Here , here.” James hands him the glass of water as he laughs trying not to spill it on him. He waits a minute for Harry to collect himself , “Alright my turn. What are you going to give me? Oh God.”

 “Uhm , I’ll give you the cow tongue. I’ve noticed that’s one of your favorites.” He says as he turns the table. “James,” he cheers as he grabs the card , “who was your least favorite carpool karaoke?” 

 “My least favorite. Well I’ll tell you,” he grabs the cow tongue and takes a huge bite out of it. The audience groans in disgust , Harry laughs and you don’t even seem bothered by it , and James notices. “You’re the first person to not even cringe at that.” He points out.

 “Dude , we eat cow tongue tacos. That was nothing.” 

 “Really?” He asks surprise.

 “She doesn’t eat it ,” Harry answers , “but it is a delicacy.”

  “Is it? Well,” he begins turning the table, “is pickled pig’s feet a delicacy as well?” 

 “it is actually.” You laugh. He shakes his head and picks up the card.

 “Y/N your question is , wow ,” he looks off to the side at one of his producers , “Is this true?”

 “What does it say?” You ask him. 

 “Is it true,” he laughs , “you were hired as a stripper for a birthday party?” There’s a scatter of ‘ooo’s” and applause from the audience.

 “Oh my God.” You cover your face. “Ok,” you remove your hands, “this was before you and I even dated.” You inform Harry. 

 “So you admit it?” He scratches his chin playfully. “Who was it?”

 “I just screwed myself over with that already. I’m not gonna say who it was.But I will explain how that happened.”

 “Oh , please do.” Harry smirks. He leans back in his chair and folds his hands behind his head. You loved this playful side of him. 

 “I will. Anyway , so yes. That is true. But it wasn’t planned like that originally. I was invited to a friend’s birthday party. And you know things got crazy. And this friend had a friend who brought a family member and their birthday was coming up as well. They were telling me they were a big fan and if I can give them an early birthday present. I assumed it was like a video or picture or whatever. No , they wanted a strip tease. I said NO at first. They were fine with it. Just ,” you let out a sigh , “ it was the tequila shots that got me man. I took too much. A very sultry song came on and it was like I floated to this person and it just happened.”

 “Wow. How much did you get paid?” James leans in to the table , curious to hear your answer.

 “I had bills thrown at me.” You laughed. “I didn’t keep the money , I actually gave tipped the guys that were working that night instead.”

 “And did you ever see this guy again?” Harry asks. You can see the hint of jealousy in his eyes.

 You smiled , knowing what he was doing. “I never saw her again. Moving on. Harry I will give you , the uhm ,  salmon smoothie,” you turned the table so it landed in front of him , “and your question is,” you pulled out the card , “Oh this one is easy. In your first album , Carolina was written about a girl, most of your songs were written from personal experiences. Is your second album any different?”

 “That’s a good question.” James commented.

 “It’s a great one.” You agreed.

 “Erm ,” Harry relaxes in his seat , “it’s a little bit of both. Personal and just whatever comes to mind. I was thinking about putting some songs that didn’t make it in to the first album in to the second one , but it’s still a work in progress. You’re just gonna have to wait until it’s finished to find out.” He smirks.

 “Does that include the studio versions of Medicine and Anna?” You joke. 

 “Next question.” He chuckles. “James I give you cod sperm and your question is.” James turns the table for Harry as he grabs the card. He jokingly clears his throat , “Who was your least favorite member of One Direction?” 

 “Oooooo.” you cheer along with the audience. 

“You can say me , I won’t get mad.” Harry jokes. James looks down at the cod sperm then up at the audience. 

 “I didn’t have a least favorite member of One Direction.”

 “Bullshit.” You and Harry call out in unison. James laughs at the two of you.

 “I’m serious. I didn’t.” 

 “We’ll give it you. But it’s not over. I can see it in your eyes. You wanna say Harry Styles.” You joke. “My turn then. What are you giving me?” You watch as James turns the table without saying a word. “Oh no! The bird saliva?!” You groan. “Even the sight of it just -” you gag.

 “Y/N your last question is. Have you ever kept a secret from Harry ? and What is it?”

 You let out a deep breath and watch the audiences reaction. There’s a few nodding their heads as if telling you to answer while the others are shaking their head. “I have.” You admit. Harry eyebrows  furrow as he waits for you to elaborate. “Harry , I’m so sorry. I didn’t want you to find out like this.” You let out a shaky nervous breath. “It’s been three months and I wanted to tell you as soon as it happened but I didn’t know how.” The whole room got quiet and you can feel the tension begin to build. James was watching you intently his hand slowly rising to his mouth as you spoke. “But here it goes,” the tears began to well up in your eyes , “Harry I’m pregnant!” You announce , cheerily.

 You can see him let out a sigh of relief and then he jumps out of his chair. The audience is cheering so loud you can barely hear what he’s saying , but he looked ecstatic. He embraced you in a tight hug and began peppering kisses all over your face. “You scared me fo’ a minute there.”

 “I’m sorry. You know I have a flare for the dramatics.” You laugh. “Also,” you grab the card from James , “it’s a girl.” You show him the ultrasound picture that was taped on the card.

 “Congratulations to Harry and Y/N on their pregnancy! Thank you for joining us tonight. It’s been a blast! See you next week!” James yells.

 You let out a deep breath and watch the audiences reaction. There’s a few nodding their heads as if telling you to answer while the others are shaking their head. “I have.” You admit. Harry eyebrows  furrow as he waits for you to elaborate. “Harry , I’m so sorry. I didn’t want you to find out like this.” You let out a shaky nervous breath. “It’s been three months and I wanted to tell you as soon as it happened but I didn’t know how.” The whole room got quiet and you can feel the tension begin to build. James was watching you intently his hand slowly rising to his mouth as you spoke. “But here it goes,” the tears began to well up in your eyes , “Harry I’m pregnant!” You announce , cheerily.

 You can see him let out a sigh of relief and then he jumps out of his chair. The audience is cheering so loud you can barely hear what he’s saying , but he looked ecstatic. He embraced you in a tight hug and began peppering kisses all over your face. “You scared me fo’ a minute there.”

 “I’m sorry. You know I have a flare for the dramatics.” You laugh. “Also,” you grab the card from James , “it’s a girl.” You show him the ultrasound picture that was taped on the card.

 “Congratulations to Harry and Y/N on their pregnancy! Thank you for joining us tonight. It’s been a blast! See you next week!” James yells.
trail.content:
Summary: You and Harry have been dating for years now and the two of you couldn’t be happier. The two of you are on Jame’s Late Late Show you’re stuck playing Fill your guts or spill your guts. How many secrets will you spill tonight?

 Harry Styles x Reader.

Warnings: Swearing. Mentions of gross food ?

 A/N: So because I’m Mexican I kinda incorporated that in to this one shot. 

 “Ok , so let’s take a look at the food that we have here.” You scrunch your nose at the sight of the food as James reads off each card. “We’ve got a salmon smoothie , cow tongue , hot sauce , pickled pig’s feet , cod sperm , calf’s brain,” You notice Harry make a disgusted face and you can’t help but laugh.

 “Oh you’re laughing now , just wait until you get a question you can’t answer.” He points at you , causing you to laugh harder. 

 “Not gonna happen. I am an open book.” You tell him.

 “We’ll just have to see about that.” James chimes in. “So this is how it’s gonna work. Y/N I’ll ask you a question , then you’ll ask Harry and Harry will ask me. We will rotate each round. Ok. Y/N will you like to go first?”

 “Oh , I would love to go first.” You smiled mischievously. “And I will give my love , “ you say slowly as you turn the table , “hmm. I’ll go easy on you and give you the hot sauce.”

 “Wow , you’re so sweet.” Harry sneered playfully.

 “First question,” you pull out the card and read it quietly to yourself first , “Oh. You better down that hot sauce now , I’m telling you.” 

 James burst out laughing , “what is it? what’s the question?”

 “Harry , what is the most annoying thing about me.” You slap the card down on the table and playfully glare at him. 

 “Don’t answer it , Harry. You can’t.” James laughs.

 “Listen to him. Or you’ll be stuck in the dog house for- NO!” You didn’t even finish your empty threat before he threw the shot glass of hot sauce back. “Oh my God.” You cover your mouth in shock. 

 “It’s spicy.” he cries. “Where’s the water?” He looks around his area for his glass of water.

 “Here , here.” James hands him the glass of water as he laughs trying not to spill it on him. He waits a minute for Harry to collect himself , “Alright my turn. What are you going to give me? Oh God.”

 “Uhm , I’ll give you the cow tongue. I’ve noticed that’s one of your favorites.” He says as he turns the table. “James,” he cheers as he grabs the card , “who was your least favorite carpool karaoke?” 

 “My least favorite. Well I’ll tell you,” he grabs the cow tongue and takes a huge bite out of it. The audience groans in disgust , Harry laughs and you don’t even seem bothered by it , and James notices. “You’re the first person to not even cringe at that.” He points out.

 “Dude , we eat cow tongue tacos. That was nothing.” 

 “Really?” He asks surprise.

 “She doesn’t eat it ,” Harry answers , “but it is a delicacy.”

  “Is it? Well,” he begins turning the table, “is pickled pig’s feet a delicacy as well?” 

 “it is actually.” You laugh. He shakes his head and picks up the card.

 “Y/N your question is , wow ,” he looks off to the side at one of his producers , “Is this true?”

 “What does it say?” You ask him. 

 “Is it true,” he laughs , “you were hired as a stripper for a birthday party?” There’s a scatter of ‘ooo’s” and applause from the audience.

 “Oh my God.” You cover your face. “Ok,” you remove your hands, “this was before you and I even dated.” You inform Harry. 

 “So you admit it?” He scratches his chin playfully. “Who was it?”

 “I just screwed myself over with that already. I’m not gonna say who it was.But I will explain how that happened.”

 “Oh , please do.” Harry smirks. He leans back in his chair and folds his hands behind his head. You loved this playful side of him. 

 “I will. Anyway , so yes. That is true. But it wasn’t planned like that originally. I was invited to a friend’s birthday party. And you know things got crazy. And this friend had a friend who brought a family member and their birthday was coming up as well. They were telling me they were a big fan and if I can give them an early birthday present. I assumed it was like a video or picture or whatever. No , they wanted a strip tease. I said NO at first. They were fine with it. Just ,” you let out a sigh , “ it was the tequila shots that got me man. I took too much. A very sultry song came on and it was like I floated to this person and it just happened.”

 “Wow. How much did you get paid?” James leans in to the table , curious to hear your answer.

 “I had bills thrown at me.” You laughed. “I didn’t keep the money , I actually gave tipped the guys that were working that night instead.”

 “And did you ever see this guy again?” Harry asks. You can see the hint of jealousy in his eyes.

 You smiled , knowing what he was doing. “I never saw her again. Moving on. Harry I will give you , the uhm ,  salmon smoothie,” you turned the table so it landed in front of him , “and your question is,” you pulled out the card , “Oh this one is easy. In your first album , Carolina was written about a girl, most of your songs were written from personal experiences. Is your second album any different?”

 “That’s a good question.” James commented.

 “It’s a great one.” You agreed.

 “Erm ,” Harry relaxes in his seat , “it’s a little bit of both. Personal and just whatever comes to mind. I was thinking about putting some songs that didn’t make it in to the first album in to the second one , but it’s still a work in progress. You’re just gonna have to wait until it’s finished to find out.” He smirks.

 “Does that include the studio versions of Medicine and Anna?” You joke. 

 “Next question.” He chuckles. “James I give you cod sperm and your question is.” James turns the table for Harry as he grabs the card. He jokingly clears his throat , “Who was your least favorite member of One Direction?” 

 “Oooooo.” you cheer along with the audience. 

“You can say me , I won’t get mad.” Harry jokes. James looks down at the cod sperm then up at the audience. 

 “I didn’t have a least favorite member of One Direction.”

 “Bullshit.” You and Harry call out in unison. James laughs at the two of you.

 “I’m serious. I didn’t.” 

 “We’ll give it you. But it’s not over. I can see it in your eyes. You wanna say Harry Styles.” You joke. “My turn then. What are you giving me?” You watch as James turns the table without saying a word. “Oh no! The bird saliva?!” You groan. “Even the sight of it just -” you gag.

 “Y/N your last question is. Have you ever kept a secret from Harry ? and What is it?”

 You let out a deep breath and watch the audiences reaction. There’s a few nodding their heads as if telling you to answer while the others are shaking their head. “I have.” You admit. Harry eyebrows  furrow as he waits for you to elaborate. “Harry , I’m so sorry. I didn’t want you to find out like this.” You let out a shaky nervous breath. “It’s been three months and I wanted to tell you as soon as it happened but I didn’t know how.” The whole room got quiet and you can feel the tension begin to build. James was watching you intently his hand slowly rising to his mouth as you spoke. “But here it goes,” the tears began to well up in your eyes , “Harry I’m pregnant!” You announce , cheerily.

 You can see him let out a sigh of relief and then he jumps out of his chair. The audience is cheering so loud you can barely hear what he’s saying , but he looked ecstatic. He embraced you in a tight hug and began peppering kisses all over your face. “You scared me fo’ a minute there.”

 “I’m sorry. You know I have a flare for the dramatics.” You laugh. “Also,” you grab the card from James , “it’s a girl.” You show him the ultrasound picture that was taped on the card.

 “Congratulations to Harry and Y/N on their pregnancy! Thank you for joining us tonight. It’s been a blast! See you next week!” James yells.

summary: He kinda touches my soul.  No matter how distant he is, no matter how many people I have around, no matter how many pretty faces...
caption:
He kinda touches my soul.


No matter how distant he is, no matter how many people I have around, no matter how many pretty faces and lovely smiles I bump into. I’d still look at him and only him. He will always be the only one who’s able to reach for my inner self and gently grab the deepest side of me. 
He  touches on it, lets my soul rest on his fingertips, intertwining the lines and drawing new beginnings for me. But he’ll always be the centre of it all. Every new road in my life will always revolve around him.


It’s like he’s the sun and I’m the moon. He got me spinning around, revolving around him and, at the end of the day, that’s what my life is all about. And every single day, he keeps me attached to him, although…like the moon and the sun, we’ll never be allowed to touch each other. 

The sun will keep on burining, and the moon will keep on spinning around him, constantly attracted to him, but knowning she’ll never be right next to him.
